page.title: 01Farmland at Mid Devon
page.content: An area of mixed farmland containing about 17 farm units where land use is mainly for cereal production and grazing for sheep,beef, cattle and dairy herd. Lesser amounts of land are cultivated for crops of mangel,swede, potatoe, kale, oilseed, rape and pea which are used as cattle feed or for human consumption.small areas of deciduous woodland survive from a bygone age. The farer and employyee live within the farm unit, taking recreation as the seasonal work permits. Their personal interests include sport of all kind, agricultural shows, gymkhanas, ploughing competition, and Young Farmer Club events. Private car transport is a necessityy. Household commodities are purchased at large storesat Crediton or Exeter.
